data.comment: The match is underway. Bristol City have kicked-off.
The first-half has come to a close in Bristol.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway. Swansea with the kick-off.
Jamal Lowe is on target to give Swansea a 0-1 advantage.
Dean Holden is making the team's first substitution at Ashton Gate with Callum O'Dowda replacing Andreas Weimann.
In the minute 74, Famara Diedhiou is replacing Steven Sessegnon for Bristol City at Ashton Gate.
The away team have replaced Jamal Lowe with Viktor Gyokeres. This is the first substitution made today by Steve Cooper.
Nahki Wells is on a sub for Taylor Moore for Bristol City.
In the minute 82, An attacking Bristol City player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
The match is now all square at 1-1 thanks to a penalty from Nahki Wells.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
